A Paper deposited w<sup>th<\sup>
M<sup>r<\sup> Hook as secretary 
To y<sup>e<\sup> Royall Society 
& not to be opened with-
out y<sup>e<\sup> consent of the 
writer M<sup>r<\sup> Boyle.
Received the 14<sup>th<\sup> October 
1680 by me R Hooke. Present 
S<sup>r<\sup> Chr. Wren M<sup>r<\sup> Abraham Hill 
M<sup>r<\sup> John Aubery M<sup>r<\sup> John Collins
